document.heading: Alcoholic Beverage Control Act Tavern Exception Amendment Act of 1999

history.narrative: Law 13-39, the “Alcoholic Beverage Control Act Tavern Exception Amendment Act of 1999” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 13-242. The Bill was adopted on first, first amended and second readings on June 8, 1999, and July 6, 1999, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 14, 1999, it was assigned Act No. 13-295. D.C. Law 13-39 became effective on October 20, 1999.
